ref.mixed-citation: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China. The Ministry of Finance and National Health Commission allocated RMB 60.33 billion yuan this year to support basic public health services and primary-level epidemic prevention and control work. Available at http://www.mof.gov.cn/zhengwuxinxi/caizhengxinwen/202001/t20200127_3464061.htm (Accessed 5 May 2020).
